name: NINJA ROAD Lite
description:
Shoot down enemy ninjas!
"NINJA ROAD" is the ninja shooting game which motifed the Japanese style painting art.


* Shoot down enemy ninjas and aim the top score!
================================
Enemy ninjas runs across the bridge, aiming to the castle.
Shoot down enemy ninjas by flicking the ninja darts at them.


The castle will be attacked when enemy ninjas cross over the bridge, and the game ends when the castle burns down.
The player gets scores by shooting down enemy ninjas, so try and aim the score as high as possible.


* Easy controls
================================
Touch the screen and flick towards enemy ninjas.
The ninja dart appears and flies towrds the flicked direction.
Enemy ninjas will fall down the bridge when they got killed.


* Enemy ninjas move in variety of movements!
================================
Enemy ninjas confuse the player by variety of movements.
Shoot down ninjas without being puzzled by them.


* Lite version limitation
================================
The game finishes automatically and migrate to the ranking screen after a certain period of time.


* Update information
================================
Changed icon picture.
